MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL53  postcode area of Pwllheli, affecting properties in Sarn, Pencaenewydd and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of broken equipment on the overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at  11:45 am on 29th October, 2020.
